name: Chole (Chickpea Curry)
history: Chole, also known as Chana Masala, is a popular dish in Indian cuisine, originating from the northern parts of India. It's a hearty and flavorful curry made with chickpeas and a blend of spices, often enjoyed with breads like Bhatura or Roti.
description: Chole is a spicy and tangy curry made using chickpeas as the main ingredient. The dish is cooked in a tomato-based sauce and a mix of traditional Indian spices, including garam masala, cumin, and coriander, giving it a rich and robust flavor.

instructions.title: Cook the Chickpeas
instructions.description: Pressure cook the soaked chickpeas with salt and enough water until they are soft and cooked through.

instructions.title: Prepare the Curry
instructions.description: Heat oil in a pan. Add cumin seeds and let them splutter. Add chopped onions and sautÃ© until golden brown. Stir in ginger-garlic paste and chopped green chilies.

instructions.title: Add Spices and Tomatoes
instructions.description: Add coriander powder, garam masala, turmeric, and red chili powder. Mix well. Add pureed tomatoes and cook until the oil separates.

instructions.title: Combine with Chickpeas
instructions.description: Add the cooked chickpeas to the curry. Add water to adjust the consistency. Simmer for 10-15 minutes.

instructions.title: Garnish and Serve
instructions.description: Garnish with chopped coriander leaves. Serve hot with Bhatura, Roti, or rice.

tips: Soaking the chickpeas overnight reduces cooking time and improves their texture.
Adjust the spice levels according to your taste preferences.
variations: Add a squeeze of lemon juice for added tanginess.
Include other vegetables like potatoes or bell peppers for more variety.

storage.shelfLife: Can be refrigerated for up to 3 days.
storage.instructions: Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator.

reheatingInstructions: Reheat on the stovetop or in a microwave until hot.
presentationTips: Serve in a traditional Indian serving dish for an authentic experience.
Pair with a side of sliced onions and lemon wedges.
